articles.title: Watch: SpaceX Sends 49 Satellites Into Orbit - Bloomberg Technology
articles.description: SpaceX sent 49 Starlink satellites into low Earth orbit on top of a Falcon 9 rocket. It blasted off from Kennedy Space Center in Florida yesterday.
